featured.text: However, Vaaler’s clips were not the same as the paperclips currently in use.
After the war, a giant paperclip statue was erected in Oslo to 40 Vaaler—even though his design was never actually manufactured.
Because of Vaaler, the paperclip played an important 37 role in Norway.
The name most frequently 34 the paperclip invention is Johan Vaaler, a Norwegian inventor.

definition.zh_def: 一種用於測量或評估的工具或設備，通常用於物理或數學的應用。
definition.en_def: A tool or device used for measuring or assessing, often applied in physical or mathematical contexts.
definition.example: The engineer used a vaaler to ensure the accuracy of the measurements.
